name: Kaelos

appearance.skin: Molten lava-like skin with cracks that pulse with intense heat
appearance.attire: Armor forged from the heart of a volcano, eternally warm to the touch

personality.temperament: Driven by both creation and destruction, with a love for crafting destinies

notes: role_in_council: One of the six gods on the council of Elysion, responsible for shaping and reforging the fate of the world.
